sys_ui_message.key: Setup notifications by selecting whether to notify when the request table or task table changes, which specific field to check for changes, and who will be the recipients of the notification.
sys_ui_message.message: Setup notifications by selecting whether to notify when the request table or task table changes, which specific field to check for changes, and who will be the recipients of the notification.
sys_ui_message.sys_name: Setup notifications by selecting whether to notify when the request table or task table changes, which specific field to check for changes, and who will be the recipients of the notification.
